TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed ActivatorLevel extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines the appropriate position for a <xref:System.Activator> in the chain of activators.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The design of activators allows for more than one activator to participate in the activation process, and additional activators can be added to the chain by using <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IActivator.NextActivator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>. Because each activator is responsible for calling the next one in the chain, an activator can position itself anywhere in the chain. The ActivatorLevel enumerator helps activators find the appropriate position in the chain.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.ActivatorLevel AppDomain = int32(12)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.ActivatorLevel Construction = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Constructs a blank object and runs the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.ActivatorLevel Context = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Finds or creates a suitable context.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.ActivatorLevel Machine = int32(20)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.ActivatorLevel Process = int32(16)
